items.summary: Update the cover page text content while keeping the same font choices, typographic hierarchy, and overall layout style: change the top-left label from “Portfolio” to “SHIVANGI KUMAR'”; change the year label to read “2026 collection”; and update the three cover highlight lines so that “Brand Design” becomes “BTech Computer Science”, “Product Design” becomes “1st year”, and “Packaging” becomes “Banasthali Vidyapeeth”.

Add the user’s uploaded portrait photo to the magazine cover (first page) and style it to match the existing editorial cover aesthetic (soft edges/shadows, paper-like feel). The cover must remain readable and responsive in both single-page (mobile) and spread (desktop) layouts.
